Package org.apache.wayang.core.plan.wayangplan.traversal

Class AbstractTopologicalTraversal<ActivatorType extends AbstractTopologicalTraversal.Activator<ActivationType>,​ActivationType extends AbstractTopologicalTraversal.Activation<ActivatorType>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.wayang.core.plan.wayangplan.traversal.AbstractTopologicalTraversal<ActivatorType,​ActivationType>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExecutionTaskFlowCompiler
    public abstract class AbstractTopologicalTraversal<ActivatorType extends AbstractTopologicalTraversal.Activator<ActivationType>,​ActivationType extends AbstractTopologicalTraversal.Activation<ActivatorType>>
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates logic to traverse a WayangPlan in a topological, bottom-up manner.

    In a topological traversal, before a node of a DAG is visited, all it predecessors are visited. Moreover, every node is visited only once. Finally, the nodes can propagate information from predecessor to successor.
